thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 25 of 97
thread.title: Janice

author: Janice
title: Janice
text:
The reason that I chose the words trust and respect is that I trust when I place my order that it will be honored. Also every book that I have purchased from Albris vendors has been better than described. Next, respect. When my books arrive and they are packaged so as to protect them during shipment it show a respect for that book or books. That is important to me.
Thank You for giving me this chance to Thank You.
